document_data.name: Lamris Kholl
document_data.mainbody: '''Lamris Kholl''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Tymora]] from [[Llorkh]] in the [[Savage Frontier]] living in [[Waterdeep]] in the early 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Lamris had a vivacious and unpredictable personality. She was capricious and irresponsible but remained a true worshiper of Tymora. For years, she toyed with fellow priest [[Adama Miiralin]]'s emotions but after he volunteered his help, she began to develop feelings for him.
document_data.History: Lamris hailed from Llorkh but escaped the [[Zhent]] tyranny there. After settling in Waterdeep, she started making plans to rescue her entire family from the city. Circa [[1372 DR]], with the help of Adama, Lamris finally managed to free her family.
